text: Stealth technology also known as LOT (Low Observability Technology) is a sub- discipline of military (like Army, Navy, Air Force, Marine, Coast Guard and National Guard in the North American United States) electronic countermeasures which covers a range of techniques used with aircraft, ships and missiles, in order to make them less visible. For example, stealth technology was developed to make aircraft difficult to detect with radar. Category:Military aviation
title: Stealth technology
